        public void draw(Texture texture,
        int x,
        int y)

        Draws a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the width and height of the texture.

        Parameters:
        texture - Texture used for rendering
        x - Position X in Display Screen
        y - Position Y in Display Screen

      • draw

        public void draw(Texture texture,
        int x,
        int y,
        double angle)

        Draws a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the width and height of the texture.

        Apply a Rotation on Texture with the given angle in degree.

        Parameters:
        texture - Texture used for rendering
        x - Position X in Display Screen
        y - Position Y in Display Screen
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree

      • draw

        public void draw(Texture texture,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height)

        Draws a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y and stretching the region to cover the given width and height.

        Parameters:
        texture - Texture used for rendering
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen

      • draw

        public void draw(Texture texture,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        double angle)

        Draws a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y and stretching the region to cover the given width and height.

        Apply a Rotation on Texture with the given angle in degree.

        Parameters:
        texture - Texture used for rendering
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree

      • draw

        public void draw(Texture texture,
        int x,
        int y,
        int srcX,
        int srcY,
        int srcWidth,
        int srcHeight)

        Draws a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

        The portion of the Texture given by srcX, srcY and srcWidth, srcHeight are used.

        Parameters:
        texture - Texture used for rendering
        x - Position X in Display Screen
        y - Position Y in Display Screen
        srcX - Starting Position X in Texture
        srcY - Starting Position Y in Texture
        srcWidth - Ending Position X in Texture
        srcHeight - Ending Position Y in Texture

      • draw

        public void draw(Texture texture,
        int x,
        int y,
        int srcX,
        int srcY,
        int srcWidth,
        int srcHeight,
        double angle)

        Draws a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

        The portion of the Texture given by srcX, srcY and srcWidth, srcHeight are used.

        Apply a Rotation on Texture with the given angle in degree.

        Parameters:
        texture - Texture used for rendering
        x - Position X in Display Screen
        y - Position Y in Display Screen
        srcX - Starting Position X in Texture
        srcY - Starting Position Y in Texture
        srcWidth - Ending Position X in Texture
        srcHeight - Ending Position Y in Texture
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree

      • draw

        public void draw(Texture texture,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        int srcX,
        int srcY,
        int srcWidth,
        int srcHeight,
        double angle)

        Draws a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

        The portion of the Texture given by srcX, srcY and srcWidth, srcHeight is used.

        Apply a Rotation on Texture with the given angle in degree.

        Parameters:
        texture - Texture used for rendering
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen
        srcX - Starting Position X in Texture
        srcY - Starting Position Y in Texture
        srcWidth - Ending Position X in Texture
        srcHeight - Ending Position Y in Texture
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree

      • draw

        public void draw(TextureOperator textureOp,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height)

        Draw a TextureOperator with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

        Parameters:
        textureOp - TextureOperator used for rendering.
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen

      • draw

        public void draw(TextureOperator textureOp,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        double angle)

        Draw a TextureOperator with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

        Parameters:
        textureOp - TextureOperator used for rendering.
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree (Optional)

        y - Bottom Position Y in Display Screen
